trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can cycle through a set of states and maintain a state once set.
trans-unit.target: 公开方法和属性，以支持 UI 自动化客户端访问的可通过一组状态循环，并设置后保持状态的控件。

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 实现 UI 自动化提供程序必须支持上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern>控件模式。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern>

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the toggle states of a control.
trans-unit.target: 循环浏览控件的切换状态。

trans-unit.source: A control must cycle through its toggle states in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, and (if supported) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: 控件必须循环切换其切换状态按以下顺序︰ <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>，和 （如果支持） <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the toggle state of the control.

A control must cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, and (if supported) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: 控件必须遍历其<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>按以下顺序︰ <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>，和 （如果支持） <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>
